name: Wireless Site Engineer (Сайт Инженер) в Оренбург
description:
ZTE is looking for Site Engineer on the 1st project (Orenburg and Chuvashia) or the 2nd project in Orenburg and Chuvashia. The candidate should be ready to relocate to Orenburg

Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for the project technical delivery, responsible for the wireless equipment, including planning, commission, debugging and technical support for wireless BTS, BSC/RNC

  • Familiar with the wireless network topology, support for the on site technical trouble shooting and alarm solving, ensure on site work be on air

  • Project manager for technical sub-team, and cooperation with other teams to support the project implementation

  • Familiar with wireless network management, data configuration and parameter modification

Requirements:

  • Familiar with telecommunications knowledge, telecommunications network topology, wireless parameters and wireless interface signaling etc

  • Ready to move to Chuvashia and Orenburg or Bryansk

  • Can work under pressure, and good communication, good work attitude

  • English speaking good

  • Better have work experience with top operator, and know ZTE wireless knowledge

We offer:
  • Competitive salary
  • Working in international company
